meanings.definition: Move up and down with short, quick motions.
meanings.sent1: The car jounced on the bumpy road.
meanings.sent2: The ball jounced off the wall.
meanings.sent3: The jounced puppy looked like it was dancing.
meanings.sent5: The jounced water in the glass created ripples.

meanings.sent1: She jounced on the trampoline with joy.
meanings.sent2: The suitcase jounced as it was loaded onto the plane.
meanings.sent3: The jounced balloon startled the cat.
meanings.sent5: The jounced bed made it hard to sleep.
